scikits.statsmodels.discretemod.MNLogit.loglike¶

MNLogit.loglike(params)¶

Log-likelihood of the multinomial logit model.

Parameters:

params : array-like

The parameters of the multinomial logit model.
Returns:

The log-likelihood function of the logit model. See notes. :

Notes

where if individual i chose alternative j and 0 if not.
